title: Extremely small rooms below average service
text:
The only redeeming thing about this hotel is MAYBE the location as it is near the central Park. The superior room were so small that you had to walk sideways to get around bed. Bathroom small.
The telephone did not work and even though we reported it for 2 days nothing happened. Eventually a serviceperson came, could not fix it and then told us we must dial the switchboard. That did not work either.
They give credit of a few dollars that is not enough for a breakfast.
Breakfasts are ample but again very expensive. Better to venture outside to a diner.
The safe could not open and again we had to wait endlessly for service.
The service taxes are hefty and more than "better rated" hotels. Wifi were only in the foyer available
We will not visit them again
